Words of advice:
(To block the program from accessing the internet, you need to use Windows Firewall. Just go to firewall, then outbound rules and then create a rule for Advanced System Optimizer.
You need to block ALL individual files in advanced system optimizer folder in c/program files. Remember to DISCONNECT THE INTERNET WHEN REGISTERING. It will take quite long to crack this program with firewall but not too long so do this and you should be registered! And please make sure you disconnect your internet when installing, registering and until the program is blocked with Windows Firewall, if you don't know how to block programs with Windows Firewall, than just navigate to the link provided in this comment and watch that video to learn how. And also, some of you guys may say that you have been sent to the pirated version webpage, the page where they say that they have collected your IP address and location, I wouldn't worry too much about that because I think that is just to scare you into buying a genuine version of the product, I've been there too but I don't think it matters.

go to C:WindowsSystem32driversetc

edit host file and put this in it


127.0.0.1  systweak.com
127.0.0.1  www.systweak.com
127.0.0.1  www.systweak.com/asov2
127.0.0.1  http://www.systweak.com
127.0.0.1  http://www.systweak.com/asov2
how does editing host files help?

Editing the host file will tell your system 127.0.0.1, which is an IP address that always points back to your own machine, you will block these sites from being able to be reached for updates and block keys.

I edited the host files. Blocked the app with firewall. But programs like driver updater are still not working properly.
